title: user_authentication_with_email_conflict_resolution
description: Test the multi-tenant user authentication system to ensure it correctly handles login attempts with email conflicts, resolving them without errors and issuing valid refresh tokens.

title: rbac_permission_enforcement_in_jwt
description: Verify that role-based access control permissions are correctly embedded in JWT tokens and enforced during API requests, restricting access based on user roles.

title: order_lifecycle_with_multiple_delivery_types
description: Validate the complete order lifecycle management including creation, state transitions, and completion for all delivery types: dine-in, takeaway, and delivery.

title: inventory_stock_deduction_using_fifo_and_recipe_logic
description: Ensure that inventory stock levels are automatically and accurately deducted using FIFO method, including recipe-based and modifier-based deductions during sales.

title: cash_register_opening_and_closing_with_difference_calculation
description: Test cash register management APIs to verify correct handling of register opening and closing, including accurate calculation of differences between expected and real totals.

title: audit_logging_of_rbac_and_security_events
description: Check that all critical RBAC permission changes, login failures, and significant cash discrepancies are logged properly and can be retrieved for audit purposes.
